person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Senegal 's President Abdou Diouf said on Friday he was proposing his foreign minister Moustapha Niasse for the post of United Nations secretary-general .

Let's think step by step.

1. Abdou Diouf (Senegal's President)
2. Moustapha Niasse (Senegal's foreign minister)
3. United Nations (organization)
4. Secretary-general (position within the United Nations)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. Abdou Diouf (Senegal's President)
2. Moustapha Niasse (Senegal's foreign minister)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|
| Abdou Diouf (Senegal's President) |
| Moustapha Niasse (Senegal's foreign minister) |

location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Senegal 's President Abdou Diouf said on Friday he was proposing his foreign minister Moustapha Niasse for the post of United Nations secretary-general .

Let's think step by step.

1. Senegal

The country where the President Abdou Diouf is from and where the foreign minister Moustapha Niasse serves.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Senegal 's President Abdou Diouf said on Friday he was proposing his foreign minister Moustapha Niasse for the post of United Nations secretary-general .

Let's think step by step.

1. Senegal
2. President Abdou Diouf (can be considered as a person but also an "Organization" as the President of a country)
3. United Nations
4. Secretary-general (position within the United Nations organization)
5. Moustapha Niasse (person)
6. Foreign minister (position within the Senegal government organization)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

1. United Nations
2. Senegal (as a country can be considered as an organization in a broader sense)
3. United Nations secretary-general (position within the United Nations organization)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| United Nations |
| Senegal (as a country) |
| United Nations secretary-general |
